task.title: How to multiply numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions about using the multiplication feature of the JPS Calculator app.

taskbody.prereq: To successfully multiply numbers, you must know what is multiplication.
taskbody.result: The result from the multiplication is displayed.

example.p: You want to multiply 4 and 5. The equation will look like: 4 × 5 = 20. You enter 4. Press multiply. Enter 5. Press equals. The result 20 appears on the screen.
